煻字的基本解释

煻
táng
〔煻煨火〕灰中的火。简称“煻”。
〔煻灰〕带火的灰。

煻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táng］
［《廣韻》徒郎切，平唐，定。］
(1)热灰火。参见“煻煨”、“煻灰”。
(2)烘焙。

煻字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煻； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页678第22
【廣韻】【集韻】?徒郞切，音唐。【廣韻】煻煨火。【集韻】熱灰謂之煻煨。　又【正字通】煻煨池在遼東北。有唐太宗烽火臺。五里閒有火穴，名煻煨池。夜明如晝。或有物去池三十步，無巨細脅入池中。

煻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
煻字的起名意思

指灰中的火或带火的灰。

煻
Basic explanation of words
煻
táng
[Simmering fire] Fire in the ashes. Referred to as "煻".
[煻灰] Ash with fire.
煻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Ping Tang, Ding. ]
(1) Hot ashes. See "煻煨", "煻灰".
(2) Baking.
煻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煻; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 678 22
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tu Yunqie, Yin Tang. [Guang Yun] Simmering fire. 【Ji Yun】Hot ash is called simmering.　[Zhengzitong] The simmering pond is in the northeast of Liaoning. There is a beacon tower of Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty. There is a fire point in Wulixian, named Nian Simmering Pond. The night is as bright as day. Or if something goes to the pool for thirty steps, no size is threatened into the pool.
煻

煻
Name meaning
Refers to the fire in the ashes or the ashes with fire.
táng
I сущ.
горячая зола
II гл.
выращивать в теплице (цветы)
